Supervised learning for factor investing
================
This page contains teaching material (**R** code) for **introductory** courses on supervised learning applied to factor investing.   

$\rightarrow$ The slides are available upon request.

------------------------------------------------------------------------


Sessions
----

The links below lead to **html** notebooks. The original **Rmd** files can be downloaded hereafter.

1.  **Economic foundations**: asset pricing anomalies, characteristics-based investing; <a href="files/ML_course/S1_Foundations.nb.html" target="_blank">**notebook**</a> - <a href="files/ML_course/S1_Foundations.pdf" target="_blank">**slides**</a>

2.  **Portfolio strategies**: portfolio back-testing framework; <a href="files/ML_course/S2_Portfolio.nb.html" target="_blank">**notebook**</a> - <a href="files/ML_course/S2_Portfolio.pdf" target="_blank">**slides**</a>

3.  **Penalized regressions & sparse portfolios**: penalised regressions for minimumn variance portfolios and for robust predictive forecasts; <a href="files/ML_course/S3_Lasso.nb.html" target="_blank">**notebook**</a> - <a href="files/ML_course/S3_LASSO.pdf" target="_blank">**slides**</a>

4.  **Data preparation**: Feature engineering and labelling with a focus on categorical data; <a href="files/ML_course/S4_Data.nb.html" target="_blank">**notebook**</a> - 

5.  **Decision trees**: Simple trees, random forests and boosted trees; <a href="files/ML_course/S5_Trees.nb.html" target="_blank">**notebook**</a> -  

6.  **Neural networks**: Multilayer perceptron and recurrent networks (**G**ated **R**ecurrent **U**nits); <a href="files/ML_course/S6_NN.nb.html" target="_blank">**notebook**</a> -    

7.  **Validating & tuning**: Performance metrics and hyper-parameter adjustment; <a href="files/ML_course/S7_Validation.nb.html" target="_blank">**notebook**</a> - 

8.  **Extensions**: SVMs, ensemble learning, interpretability and deflated Sharpe ratios; <a href="files/ML_course/S8_Extensions.nb.html" target="_blank">**notebook**</a> -

Material
----------

Datasets (in R format - they end in February 2021):  

- <a href="https://github.com/shokru/coqueret.github.io/blob/master/files/ML_course/data.RData" target="_blank">**Base** (small)</a>: 30 firms, 7 features, year 2000 onwards;  
- <a href="https://github.com/shokru/coqueret.github.io/blob/master/files/data_full.RData" target="_blank">**Large**</a>: 900+ firms, 5 features, year 1995 onwards;  
- <a href="https://github.com/shokru/coqueret.github.io/blob/master/files/data_esg.RData" target="_blank">**ESG**</a>: 380+ firms, 6 features, year 2014 onwards.
